column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Food: Daughter in law and I had the sprouting up ramen
column2: she had it on my recommendation from my first visit. My granddaughter had the child's meal. We all shared the gyoza. The Sprouting Up Ramen was awful
column4: there was zero of the flavor and richness that I experienced the first visit. The kids meal on the other hand was amazing chicken ramen (the only reason they get Â stars)
column5: it had the same richness and flavor I experienced my first visit. We all shared the gyoza which were also amazing again.
